name: DiastolicBloodPressureGreaterThanEqualTo90
title: Diastolic Blood Pressure Greater Than Equal To 90
description: This value set are the administrative billing codes that represent only a diastolic blood pressure reading >= 90.  There are not codes that include both a diastolic reading and a systolic reading.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Diastolic blood pressure),(Data Element Scope: Representative diastolic blood pressure >= 90),(Inclusion Criteria: Administrative billing codes representative diastolic blood pressure >= 90),(Exclusion Criteria: Administrative billing codes representative of systolic blood pressure or diastolic blood pressure < 90)

contains.display: Most recent diastolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 90 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 90 mm hg (htn, ckd, cad) (dm)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure >= 90 mmhg
